name: Create a new content in Drupal from a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template regularly checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to create new content in Drupal. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kq2xH4IQ-sv8wBlvmFX8L7QKbJb-JqoqVUZV7Wi5axg/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the source of the data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module.
